description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Foreign Minister says Tehran has sent a clear warning to the White House emphasizing its readiness to swiftly and decisively respond to any fresh military adventures by Israel that threaten Iran's interests and security.
title: Iran has warned US any fresh Israeli military act will face decisive and quick response

description: TEHRAN –  A senior Iranian military spokesman warned on Monday night that Iran will “cut the foot of any aggressor” that launches attack on the Iranian territory, warning the U.S., Britain, France and Germany to stop supporting the Zionist regime of Israel.
title: Iranian military says will “cut the foot of aggressor”

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Greco-Roman wrestlers Naser Alizadeh and Amin Mirzazadeh claimed two gold medal in the 2024 Asian Wrestling Championships on Monday in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan.
title: Iranian Greco-Roman wrestlers win two golds at Asian championships

description: TEHRAN- Recent surveys in the United States and the United Kingdom have revealed another dip in public support for the occupation regime of Israel.
title: Public support drops for Israel in US and Britain

description: The spokesperson for the Arab League Council’s Secretary-General, Jamal Rushdi, has condemned the escalation of Israeli settler attacks on several Palestinian villages in the occupied West Bank.
title: Arab League condemns rise in Israeli settler attacks in West Bank

description: A mass grave was discovered at al-Shifa Medical Complex after a deadly Israeli assault last month left the Gaza City hospital in ruins.
title: Mass grave discovered at al-Shifa hospital

description: A Palestinian man has been shot dead and two others have been wounded by Israeli forces during a raid into the city of Nablus, in the northern occupied West Bank.
title: Israeli soldiers kill Palestinian man in West Bank

description: Israel notified Monday three Palestinian families to evict their homes in Sheikh Jarrah neighborhood of the occupied city of Jerusalem for the benefit of the colonist militias.
title: Israel issues eviction order against three Palestinian families in Sheikh Jarrah

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s foreign minister has condemned Germany for backing the Zionist regime, recommending Berlin to concentrate on bringing about peace in Gaza rather than sabotaging Tehran’s justifiable operation in response to the Israeli attack on Iran’s diplomatic premises in Syria.
title: Iran decries Germany backing of Israel

description: TEHRAN- A commemoration ceremony for the late Iranian director Kioumars Pourahmad is scheduled to take place at the Seifollah Dad Hall of the House of Cinema in Tehran on Wednesday evening.
title: Iranian House of Cinema to commemorate late director Kiumars Pourahmad

description: TEHRAN- A photo exhibition titled “Return; photos of life after the war in Syria” opened on Sunday at the Iran Photographers Gallery No. 2, based in Art Bureau in Tehran.
title: Art Bureau exhibition showcases photos of Syrian people after war

description: TEHRAN-A new Persian translation of Russian poet and novelist Boris Pasternak’s 1957 novel “Doctor Zhivago” has come to Iranian bookstores.
title: New Persian translation of “Doctor Zhivago” comes to Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN- Iran's Army Chief has underscored the formidable defensive prowess of the Iranian Armed Forces, signaling a robust deterrence against any aggression directed toward the Islamic Republic.
title: Iran's Army chief issues strong warning against enemies' aggression

description: TEHRAN- Another appalling massacre is feared in the Gaza Strip as Israeli forces open fire on Palestinian civilians who try to return to their homes in the territory’s north.
title: Bloodbath on the coastal road

description: Lebanon’s Hezbollah resistance movement said its fighters have “planted explosive devices in the Tal Ismail area” inside Lebanon, detonating them after Israeli soldiers “crossed the border”.
title: Hezbollah attacks Israeli troops who ‘crossed border’

description: Colombian President Gustavo Petro has accused Israel of failing to comply with the UN Security Council’s cease-fire resolution in Gaza.
title: Colombia accuses Israel of not obeying UN ceasefire resolution

description: TEHRAN- The recent operation to retaliate against the Israeli regime, according to the Iranian foreign minister, has improved the nation’s diplomatic standing abroad and redefined the balance of power in West Asia.
title: Iran FM congratulates military commanders on ‘Operation Truthful Promise’

description: TEHRAN - Iran carried out what some analysts have named “the biggest drone attack of history” against the occupied territories on Saturday and in the early hours of Sunday.
title: Iron lies

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s Ambassador and Permanent Representative to the United Nations, Amir Saeid Iravani, defended his country’s military actions against the Israeli regime as a legitimate act of self-defense in accordance with Iran’s rights.
title: Iran has legitimate right to self-defense against Israeli regime: envoy

description: TEHRAN- In a tribute to Operation True Promise, Mojtaba Zolnouri, the Deputy Speaker of the Iranian Parliament, has commended the valiant efforts of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC), hailing their recent actions as a resounding victory.
title: IRGC's retaliatory strike humiliated Zionist regime and its supporters, affirms MP

description: A year of war between rival military factions in Sudan has pushed parts of the country to the brink of famine, and left 25 million people — about half the population — in need of humanitarian aid, according to aid agencies.
title: Aid groups warn of looming famine in Sudan

description: TEHRAN - Kayhan dedicated its headline to Iran's direct attack on Israel and wrote: Cruise and ballistic missiles and drones of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps humiliated Israel on Sunday morning in response to the numerous crimes of the barbaric Zionist regime, including the martyrdom of a group of IRGC forces in Syria.
title: Iran opened the gates of hell to Israel

description: The Iranian operation on April 13, which aimed at the occupied territories, made headlines worldwide. Let's briefly examine the various aspects of the attack known as "Truthful Promise" to comprehend Iran's rationale and decision-making behind the offensive.
title: 10 Questions and answers about Iran's retaliatory attack on Israel

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has announced that it summoned the ambassadors of the UK, Germany, and France following the irresponsible positions of these countries about IRGC's operation against Israel.
title: Iran summons envoys of UK, German, France

description: TEHRAN – Iran's Foreign Ministry spokesperson has underscored Iran's commitment to upholding international standards and laws while emphasizing its efforts to prevent further escalation of tensions in the region.
title: Iran does not aim to escalate regional tension: Spox

description: TEHRAN – Iran's Foreign Ministry spokesperson has underscored Iran's commitment to upholding international standards and laws while emphasizing its efforts to prevent further escalation of tensions in the region.
title: Iran says does not aim to escalate regional tension

description: TEHRAN – A member of the Iranian Parliament says Tehran's retaliatory attack against Israel only demonstrated a glimpse of the country’s military strength.
title: Iran’s military strength showcased in retaliatory attack against Israel: MP

description: TEHRAN – In a recent emergency meeting of the United Nations Security Council, envoys from Iran, Syria, Russia, and China voiced strong criticism against the United States and other nations involved in the interception of drones and missiles during Iran's retaliatory attack against Israel.
title: What went on during UNSC meeting on Iran’s retaliation?

description: Tehran-The children's play “Giants and School Children” written by Syd Hoff will be staged at Tehran Pardis Theater Complex from April 16 to 26.
title: Tehran Pardis Theater Complex to host Syd Hoff’s children's play

description: TEHRAN – Iran suffered a heavy 70-39 loss against Germany at the 2024 International Wheelchair Basketball Federation (IWBF) Men's Repechage on Monday.
title: Germany defeat Iran at 2024 IWBF Men's Repechage

description: TEHRAN – As the three-day Eid al-Fitr holidays officially came to an end following the two-week Nowruz holidays, statistics bring to light that Iran’s Chaharmahal-Bakhtiari lodged approximately 75,000 travelers in 30 days.
title: Chaharmahal-Bakhtiari: Nowruz draws tens of thousands of travelers

description: TEHRAN – Iranian authorities have confiscated 33 historical relics from smugglers in the Rudbar region, northern Iran.
title: Police recover illegally-held relics in northern Iran

description: TEHRAN - Handicraft workshops across Iran welcomed a staggering two million visits, during the Nowruz (Persian New Year) holidays from March 19 to April 1, an official with the tourism ministry said.
title: 2m visits paid to handicraft workshops in Nowruz holidays

description: TEHRAN - During the very first month of the current Iranian year, as per records, Mazandaran province welcomed over 18 million visitors hailing from across Iran, signaling a substantial boost in tourism.
title: 18m holidaymakers find serenity amidst Mazandaran beauties in month

description: TEHRAN - More than six million foreign tourists arrived by air, road, and sea in Iran during the past Iranian calendar year, which came to an end on March 19.
title: Tourist arrivals in Iran tops six million in year

description: The current conflict between Palestine and Israel, as a result of Israel’s long occupation and triggered by the October 7 Hamas attack, has already proved to be consequential in many ways, big and small. As an issue catching the eye all over the world, the positions and reactions of major powers, and the interactions of regional and extra-regional actors, will all become part of the history, and the implications of the conflict on international order are particularly worthy of talking about.
title: Palestine-Israel conflict: Implications on international order

description: TEHRAN – Former Persepolis football team head coach Yahya Golmohammadi has been shortlisted to take charge of Tractor.
title: Yahya Golmohammadi shortlisted for Tractor hot seat
Iron dome or Emperor's New Clothes

description: TEHRAN – The Central Bank of Iran (CBI) is going to provide 3.5 quadrillion rials (about $7 billion) of funds for various economic sectors in the current Iranian calendar year (started on March 20) using new financing methods.
title: CBI plans to supply $7b for economic sectors via new financing methods

description: Swamphen is a rare species found around freshwater swamps, streams, and marshes in northern and southern parts of Iran.
title: On the brink of extinction

description: The development of Russian scientists is intended for the treatment of bacterial infections caused by antibiotic-resistant microorganisms.
title: Russian scientists develop new medicine

description: TEHRAN –Health Minister Bahram Einollahi has announced that hospitals across the country will be equipped with 9,000 new beds in the current Iranian calendar year that started on March 20.
title: Hospitals to be equipped with 9,000 more beds

description: TEHRAN – According to experts, the current penalties do not provide a significant deterrent effect for wildlife crimes, so it has been decided to triple them, an official with the Department of Environment has said.
title: DOE plans to triple penalties for wildlife crimes

description: TEHRAN –The 14th edition of the Quacquarelli Symonds (QS) World University Rankings by Subject 2024 has included 17 Iranian universities in 17 subject entries, compared with 16 universities in 2023.
title: 17 Iranian universities in QS ranking 2024 by subject

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), rose 10,140 points to 2,206,907 on Monday, which is the third day of Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX gains 10,000 points on Monday

description: TEHRAN – Iran exported $20 million worth of commodities to Belarus in the previous Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19), registering a 34 percent rise compared to the year before.
title: Annual exports to Belarus rise 34%

description: TEHRAN - The value of Iran’s exports to Russia rose 26 percent in the past Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19), as compared to the preceding year, an official with Iran’s Trade Promotion Organization (TPO) said.
title: Iran’s annual exports to Russia rises 26%

description: TEHRAN - Iran produced more than 635,000 metric tons (mt) of aluminum ingots over the past Iranian calendar year (ended on March 19), IRNA reported.
title: Iran’s annual aluminum ingot output surges to 635,000 mt

description: TEHRAN – Several major water and energy projects are going to be inaugurated by the presidents of Iran and Sri Lanka in the near future, ISNA reported.
title: Iran to launch several water projects in Sri Lanka

description: TEHRAN – Spanish coach Paco Jemez will likely part ways with Iranian football club Tractor.
title: Paco Jemez, Tractor on verge of parting ways

description: TEHRAN - The physical readiness of Hassan Yazdani, prominent face of Iranian and world wrestling, is uncertain for taking part at the 2024 Olympic Games after undergoing shoulder surgery in last November.
title: Kamran Ghasempour a serious rival for Hassan Yazdani in 86kg
